game.name: SORROW: Rise of Divinity
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An open-world action survival game combining fast-paced battle royale, competitive deathmatches, trophy hunting, and intense missions—where strategy and skill determine your fate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An open-world action survival game combining fast-paced battle royale, competitive deathmatches, trophy hunting, and intense missions—where strategy and skill determine your fate.
